answerText: The Human Comedy [or La Comedie humaine][10] This realist French author wrote The Human Comedy, which includes a novel involving Eugene de Rastignac, Le Pere Goriot.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 2 | 9 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Two sections of this work are "Scenes from Parisian life" and "Scenes from Provincial life." For 10 points each: [10] Name this series of novels and short stories that includes Cousin Bette and Eugenie Grandet.
